Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: viewBarIdentifier
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: Internal identifier tag for the bottom view bar

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: textfieldBarIdentifier
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: Internal identifier tag for the UITextField accessory view progress bars

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: placeholderAccessoryViewIdentifier
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: Internal identifier for an auxiliar accessory view necessary when there’s no accessory view on the UITextField

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: presentingView
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: The view which the bottom progress bar should be displayed

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: textFields
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: The UITextField objects that should display the progress bars

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: progress
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: The current progress to be displayed. This value should be between 0 and 1. The default value is 0

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: progressBarColor
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: The fill color of the progress bar. The default value is a light blue

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: progressBarHeight
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: The height of the progress bar. The default value is 5

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: shouldDisplayBottomViewBar
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: Determines if the bottom progress bar should be displayed or not. The default value is true

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: setupProgressBar(frame:)
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: Setup the progress bar view. For a custom progress abr, this

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: setupBottomViewBar(frame:)
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: Setup the bottom view progress bar. By default, this bar is

Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.name: updateBarState()
Classes/InputProgress.html#/s:13InputPro.abstract: Adds the progress bar UIView on the bottom of the presentingView

Classes/InputProgress.html.name: InputProgress
Classes/InputProgress.html.abstract: Sets up and handle both the bottom view and UITextField bars
